original_text: then your heart be lifted up, and you forget the Lord your God, who brought you out of the land of Egypt, out of the house of slavery,
korean_text: 네 마음이 교만하여 네 하나님 여호와를 잊어버릴까 염려하노라 여호와는 너를 애굽 땅 종 되었던 집에서 이끌어 내시고

sentences.original_text: then your heart be lifted up
and you forget the Lord your God
who brought you out of the land of Egypt
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 너를 애굽 땅에서 인도하여 내셨으니

sentences.original_text: out of the house of slavery
